attributes.action: expedite the construction of the A556 BYPASS between the M6 Jct 19 and M56 Jct 7
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is in accordance with Option B of the Highways Agency Route Management Sudy.   The route will turn west at Church Farm to bypass Mere Hall and then run in a northerly direction to cross the A50. It will then run parallel to the A556 and bypass Bucklow Hill to the west before rejoining the existing A556 just beyond Millington Hall Lane.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "expedite the construction of the A556 BYPASS between the M6 Jct 19 and M56 Jct 7"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17886


Prime Minister's Office
